item.title: AWS Advanced Networking Specialty Study Guide Chapter 2 Exercises Walkthrough
item.description: What I’m doing I’ve been studying for the AWS Advanced Networking Specialty exam off and on for a few months now. As I ramp up to actually take the test, I’ve decided to blog my journey of going through the official AWS book exercises at the end of each chapter. The plan is to make a quick little blog post as I walk through each as a way to learn in public and get myself into practicing writing more.
